projects.title: Sentence BERT
projects.description: Efficient **Rust** implementation of the [**Sentence BERT**](https://arxiv.org/abs/1908.10084) NLP model for **real-time inference**

projects.title: Sentence Transformers
projects.description: Major **contributor** to [**v0.3.0**](https://github.com/UKPLab/sentence-transformers/releases/tag/v0.3.0) of the library by fixing and adding support for several **new loss functions**

projects.title: Artflow
projects.description: **ArtFlow** is a **VR 3D software**, in which you can **draw your own world** using VR controllers! **Check it out**!

projects.title: Real-Time Path Tracer
projects.description: **Real-time Path Tracer** in **CUDA** and **OpenGL** with support for **BRDF with roughness**, **volume raymarching**, texturing, normal maps, triangle meshes loading, cubemaps, scene description, UI, **and more**!
